data.what_is:
Introducing ClickDimensions: the only unified marketing, analytics and services platform natively built within Microsoft Dynamics. 

Empower your team to save time and focus on what matters most with ClickDimensions multi-channel marketing automation technology. Discover deeper insights into your marketing results and revenue impact with ClickDimensions marketing dashboards. Maximize your marketing output and reach your goals faster with a full range of world-class marketing services.

Over 3,700 customers across 76 countries trust us to provide the tools they need to drive marketing results. Discover what ClickDimensions can help you achieve.
data.product_description: Marketing Automation for Microsoft Dynamics CRMClickDimensions is natively built into Dynamics CRM. ClickDimensions' email marketing and marketing automation features are fully embedded in Microsoft Dynamics CRM - features are accessed through the CRM interface and data is stored in your CRM database, providing a seamless marketing, sales and customer relationship experience for your users.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 94 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 81 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 72 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 97 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 94 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 101 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 69 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 85 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 102 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 72 ClickDimensions reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.content: As reported in 26 ClickDimensions reviews. Ability to define a custom domain from which emails are sent.

features.name: Dedicated IPView full feature definition

features.name: Documentation

features.name: Sender Reputation Management

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I feel there is a learning curve, but as they say, anything worth doing isn't easy. The learning curve is not that steep if you already have experiecne with other platforms, and as a daily user, i feel it was a fairly quick process to fall into a routine.  Implemtnation / Integration  is fairly simple when using qualified CRM experts. Things i like most are being able to see who clicked and opened isntead of constantly having to query for it. Many of the reviews i've seen are comparing apples to oranges, mainly because the CD ecoystem is all inclusive, whereasother platforms requrie that you switch from here to see this, and then over to here to see that. CD provides a single ecosystem that directly accesses your CRM. The CSMs and the Support team ar etop notch, very repsonsive and proactive in helping.  I'd say the biggest positive is with value. Sure there are better platforms, and there are cheaper platforms, but the value of each are no where near the value provided at this price point.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Limitations in the Social media area, UX needs to be updated to be more modern, but it still passes the eye test. Would love to see more ability to customize things out of the box, rather than require coders and/or other experts to fully achieve my most desired functionality. There is no simple way to add pop-ups to a website, but again, if you have the expertise on HTML/CSS or have the resources, it isn't a heavy lift. There is often some nuances that can only be learned the hard way or with in-depth training from someone with extensive experience on the platform.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
In today's world, having a "tech stack" is almost unavoidable. Having to go from one platform to another, to another, and so on is par for the course, but having a single platform that reduces a lot fo the back and forth and integrates web, email, NPS surveys with responses, and much more that is readily avaiable in the CRM increases productivity, reduces the back and forth and confusion of "dang, where was i...what was i doing befor ei had to switch to this that and the other...". I love that the ecosystem provides all of this visiblity, meanwhile i am able to automate a lot of my campaigns (set it and forget it) and focus mor eon reporting.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I like using ClickDimensions because it integrates with Microsoft Dynamics which is our current CRM. I can connect my social media accounts and therefore not only track how my leads engage with my email content, but I can also track how they engage with our social content directly from their lead record in CRM. The views are incredibly useful if you know how to query them properly. With the audiences feature, we are able to dig into our CRM data to uncover richer audience and lead types to craft campaigns around. We then, use the A/B test feature to determine a winning strategy and tweak form there.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I would say as with most technology, ClickDimensions can be incredibly glitchy. We have been experiencing a strange issue with one of our users not being able to save after she changes the color of a button in an email. The user submitted a ticket to the support desk and it looks like it's a known issue in ClickDimensions but we have yet to hear back from support on how to rectify the issue. This issue also pushed out our lead email campaigns by a week. We'd rather send them right and late than wrong and on time. This is a consistent issue with ClickDimensions and it would be nice to see a resolution on the issue of the system actually saving when we click the button.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
CD allows us some additional insight and visibility of how we are obtaining leads, where our most successful sources are, what are the top states for engagement, etc. We can see more of a snapshot into our sales funnel and where the lead dropped off, changed their mind, etc.

initial_reviews.review_title: Es un producto muy equilibrado entre tamano, potencia y usabilidad
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Es un producto totalmente integrado en Dynamics 365 lo que facilita sobremanera el analisis de la informacion por estar toda ella en el mismo repositorio. Esta integracion facilita una frecuencia uso natural de la herramienta de forma habitual.
Por otra parte, aunque posiblemente tenga menos funcionalidad que otros productos similares, la que tiene se adapta especialmente bien a la realidad de los departamentos de marketing en las empresas espanolas. Pocas personas pueden hacer muchas cosas de una manera facil.
Tambien es importante resenar que tienen una muy buena atencion al cliente y que ponerlo en marcha desde el punto de vista operativo es muy sencillo y rapido.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
No le veo especiales desventajas. Hasta hace poco tiempo, el uso de Http en lugar de https en los contenidos web, era una limitacion importante, pero afortunadamente eso se ha resuelto y ahora todos los componentes web (Landig pages, encuestas, formularios,..) se generan con diresccion segura al igual que los enlaces en los envios de emails.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Utilizamos ClickDimensions desde hace 6 anos para la mayoria de las acciones de marketing B2B.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
review_question_answers.answer:
Es un producto totalmente integrado en Dynamics 365 lo que facilita sobremanera el analisis de la informacion por estar toda ella en el mismo repositorio. Esta integracion facilita una frecuencia uso natural de la herramienta de forma habitual.
Por otra parte, aunque posiblemente tenga menos funcionalidad que otros productos similares, la que tiene se adapta especialmente bien a la realidad de los departamentos de marketing en las empresas espanolas. Pocas personas pueden hacer muchas cosas de una manera facil.
Tambien es importante resenar que tienen una muy buena atencion al cliente y que ponerlo en marcha desde el punto de vista operativo es muy sencillo y rapido.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
review_question_answers.answer: No le veo especiales desventajas. Hasta hace poco tiempo, el uso de Http en lugar de https en los contenidos web, era una limitacion importante, pero afortunadamente eso se ha resuelto y ahora todos los componentes web (Landig pages, encuestas, formularios,..) se generan con diresccion segura al igual que los enlaces en los envios de emails.

initial_reviews.review_title: Lots of powerfull options, but a bit of a complicated UI
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The amount of personalization and automation is very usefull in a B2B setting. We keep finding new ways to optimize and personalize our marketing campaigns with the tools in ClickDimensions. Also the options to connect the tool with other services is very usefull as it allows us to integrate with our other systems.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
There is a big learning curve. We work with a lot of marketers from all over the world on ClickDimensions and most of them don't know most of the features. In my opinion the ease of use could be improved so more marketers will use more of the features.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
On of our biggest needs that ClickDimensions is helping is marketing automation. We run a lot of campaings and before we had to manage everything in Excel sheets which was not ideal. It is easy to forget to follow up or make mistakes if everything is manual. By automating these processes we became much more efficient.

initial_reviews.review_title: Unified experience make it easier to manage all at one place
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions provides a variety of software to choose from. We went for the Hubspot marketing automation software. It gave us a holistic view of our marketing performance and the recommendations and analytics are very high quality, helping us in speedy decision making. The data can be modelled in many different ways and has helped us reach different customer groups with ease.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The software can look overwhelming at first and requires some hands on experience

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
It is helping us to improve our ROI, time to market, also helping in automating manual tasks and helping to identify latest trends.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Marketing Automation in ClickDimensions allows my team to complete their tasks easier and therefore quicker. We find the Campaign Automation especially useful and we want to explore the use of Web Forms in the future to avoid manual imports of leads. Customer Support has been very helpful in answering our enquiries, too.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I dislike the fact that contact record view is different in Dynamics and ClickDimensions. I needed IT support to consolidate the views, so that I don't have to switch between them to view all the collected information about a contact.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions is solving the problem of sending GDPR-compliant emails by Subscription Management Opt-In method. Our team found switching to that method easy and now we are confident that we send only GDPR-compliant emails to our leads.

initial_reviews.review_title: Best tool for email and social media automation for marketing
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The standout feature of SnapMetrics software lies in its seamless blend of user-friendly interface and unparalleled result-driven functionalities. It ensures continuous customer engagement through its intuitive design and remarkable outcome generation.

An exceptional tool that streamlines the creation and automation of emails, adeptly scheduling them based on your preferred timing. SnapMetrics extends its prowess to include survey creation and publication, facilitating the collection of valuable customer feedback and insights into their preferences.

In the realm of social media marketing and advertising, SnapMetrics reigns supreme, offering an invaluable feature set. It not only enables automated calculation of visitor view time but also meticulously tracks user activities on webpages and campaigns.

With its user-friendly design, SnapMetrics easily integrates with a myriad of third-party applications and platforms. Its adaptability spans across multiple web pages, efficiently gathering and unifying data for enhanced marketing strategies.

When it comes to customer communication, SnapMetrics stands as the optimal tool, boasting a plethora of features that simplify and elevate your workflow.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Expand template options for diverse campaigns, considering industry-specific themes and a user-friendly customization feature for a more personalized touch.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions addresses marketing challenges by simplifying automated campaigns, enhancing engagement, and providing analytics. This benefits by streamlining processes, boosting customer interaction, and refining strategies.

initial_reviews.review_title: Clunky interface, but good if you use Dynamics
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I find ClickDimensions to be a valuable tool due to its seamless integration with Microsoft Dynamics, our current CRM system.

The audiences feature enables us to delve into our CRM data, revealing more nuanced audience and lead types to inform targeted campaigns. Additionally, we leverage the A/B test feature to identify a winning strategy and make adjustments accordingly.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions is less feature-rich than other marketing platforms I've used previously e.g. autogenerating plain text verions of emails.

The interface for creating email campaigns is super clunky.

The training academy is also very basic.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Helping us to segment our data in our CRM, contact relevant people and see how they are interacting with our content on site

initial_reviews.review_title: Overall Pretty Good with a few Issues
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Click Dimensions is easy to use and the reporting provided is excellent.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The editor and what actually gets sent out often look different. many times extra code will get stuck in the editor and it will affect font size, etc. Not exactly WYSIWYG. Also, because it pulls onl;y contacts from our AMS (Protech) and not registrants, etc. at times getting the marketing list correct is tricky.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
It allows us to pull fresh data and track responses.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The support team at Click Dimensions is great, they are speedy and offer some great advice. Their individual marketing tools are pretty easy to pick up and use.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The marketing tools do talk to one another but can be quite a process to have them all work cohesively. There are many limitations that we have faced such as; Marketing lists can only be tied to one subscription list, cannot combine email preferences in unsubscribe, and cannot include a survey in unsubscribe. We have been able to find workarounds with the support team however it is not ideally how we would like things to be set up.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Do a full analysis on ClickDimensions, Hubspot & Marketo and determine which one fits your needs.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions has allowed us to capture leads, have their profiles within our CRM and track their activity through the lead process. We're able to communicate with our segmented customers effectively.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I feel there is a learning curve, but as they say, anything worth doing isn't easy. The learning curve is not that steep if you already have experiecne with other platforms, and as a daily user, i feel it was a fairly quick process to fall into a routine.  Implemtnation / Integration  is fairly simple when using qualified CRM experts. Things i like most are being able to see who clicked and opened isntead of constantly having to query for it. Many of the reviews i've seen are comparing apples to oranges, mainly because the CD ecoystem is all inclusive, whereasother platforms requrie that you switch from here to see this, and then over to here to see that. CD provides a single ecosystem that directly accesses your CRM. The CSMs and the Support team ar etop notch, very repsonsive and proactive in helping.  I'd say the biggest positive is with value. Sure there are better platforms, and there are cheaper platforms, but the value of each are no where near the value provided at this price point.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Limitations in the Social media area, UX needs to be updated to be more modern, but it still passes the eye test. Would love to see more ability to customize things out of the box, rather than require coders and/or other experts to fully achieve my most desired functionality. There is no simple way to add pop-ups to a website, but again, if you have the expertise on HTML/CSS or have the resources, it isn't a heavy lift. There is often some nuances that can only be learned the hard way or with in-depth training from someone with extensive experience on the platform.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
In today's world, having a "tech stack" is almost unavoidable. Having to go from one platform to another, to another, and so on is par for the course, but having a single platform that reduces a lot fo the back and forth and integrates web, email, NPS surveys with responses, and much more that is readily avaiable in the CRM increases productivity, reduces the back and forth and confusion of "dang, where was i...what was i doing befor ei had to switch to this that and the other...". I love that the ecosystem provides all of this visiblity, meanwhile i am able to automate a lot of my campaigns (set it and forget it) and focus mor eon reporting.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I like using ClickDimensions because it integrates with Microsoft Dynamics which is our current CRM. I can connect my social media accounts and therefore not only track how my leads engage with my email content, but I can also track how they engage with our social content directly from their lead record in CRM. The views are incredibly useful if you know how to query them properly. With the audiences feature, we are able to dig into our CRM data to uncover richer audience and lead types to craft campaigns around. We then, use the A/B test feature to determine a winning strategy and tweak form there.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I would say as with most technology, ClickDimensions can be incredibly glitchy. We have been experiencing a strange issue with one of our users not being able to save after she changes the color of a button in an email. The user submitted a ticket to the support desk and it looks like it's a known issue in ClickDimensions but we have yet to hear back from support on how to rectify the issue. This issue also pushed out our lead email campaigns by a week. We'd rather send them right and late than wrong and on time. This is a consistent issue with ClickDimensions and it would be nice to see a resolution on the issue of the system actually saving when we click the button.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
CD allows us some additional insight and visibility of how we are obtaining leads, where our most successful sources are, what are the top states for engagement, etc. We can see more of a snapshot into our sales funnel and where the lead dropped off, changed their mind, etc.

all_reviews.review_title: Es un producto muy equilibrado entre tamano, potencia y usabilidad
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Es un producto totalmente integrado en Dynamics 365 lo que facilita sobremanera el analisis de la informacion por estar toda ella en el mismo repositorio. Esta integracion facilita una frecuencia uso natural de la herramienta de forma habitual.
Por otra parte, aunque posiblemente tenga menos funcionalidad que otros productos similares, la que tiene se adapta especialmente bien a la realidad de los departamentos de marketing en las empresas espanolas. Pocas personas pueden hacer muchas cosas de una manera facil.
Tambien es importante resenar que tienen una muy buena atencion al cliente y que ponerlo en marcha desde el punto de vista operativo es muy sencillo y rapido.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
No le veo especiales desventajas. Hasta hace poco tiempo, el uso de Http en lugar de https en los contenidos web, era una limitacion importante, pero afortunadamente eso se ha resuelto y ahora todos los componentes web (Landig pages, encuestas, formularios,..) se generan con diresccion segura al igual que los enlaces en los envios de emails.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Utilizamos ClickDimensions desde hace 6 anos para la mayoria de las acciones de marketing B2B.

all_reviews.review_title: Lots of powerfull options, but a bit of a complicated UI
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The amount of personalization and automation is very usefull in a B2B setting. We keep finding new ways to optimize and personalize our marketing campaigns with the tools in ClickDimensions. Also the options to connect the tool with other services is very usefull as it allows us to integrate with our other systems.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
There is a big learning curve. We work with a lot of marketers from all over the world on ClickDimensions and most of them don't know most of the features. In my opinion the ease of use could be improved so more marketers will use more of the features.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
On of our biggest needs that ClickDimensions is helping is marketing automation. We run a lot of campaings and before we had to manage everything in Excel sheets which was not ideal. It is easy to forget to follow up or make mistakes if everything is manual. By automating these processes we became much more efficient.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The support team at Click Dimensions is great, they are speedy and offer some great advice. Their individual marketing tools are pretty easy to pick up and use.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The marketing tools do talk to one another but can be quite a process to have them all work cohesively. There are many limitations that we have faced such as; Marketing lists can only be tied to one subscription list, cannot combine email preferences in unsubscribe, and cannot include a survey in unsubscribe. We have been able to find workarounds with the support team however it is not ideally how we would like things to be set up.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Do a full analysis on ClickDimensions, Hubspot & Marketo and determine which one fits your needs.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Use Emailer Marketing Platform
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
We like the integration with Microsoft Dynamics 365. It allows us to create custom audiences at a level we could not with other marketing platforms. The Draft and Drop software is easy enough that you can build your own emails without any experience, but also built in such a way that you can use your own HTML code to build them however you like.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions offers several features we do not need as a company, and we would prefer to exclude them from our contracts. You are also locked in for a 12-month contract, which is quite a significant investment upfront compared to the monthly billing with other platforms.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have had issues in the past with upgrading our Click Dimensions platform. It was extremely costly for our team in terms of time to fix. We were 'down' for 3 months. This and we only recieved the proper support once we requested for our contract to be terminated. While it is great they are doing active updates to their software, they also need to consider the support they provide to their customers when these updates break things.

One of the standout features of ClickDimensions is its user-friendly interface that makes it easy to set up and run campaigns. The drag-and-drop functionality allows to easily design email templates, landing pages, and forms; a plus is the platform's integration with Microsoft Dynamics 365. Much appreciated the ability to connect for digital event management such as integration with Zoom

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
One of the possibly integrable points on which it could help the organization is a multilingual management of contents such as emails and landing pages, which for companies that work in a multinational environment could help with the tasks of creating and managing the different languages

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Inefficient marketing processes: ClickDimensions streamlines marketing processes, enabling businesses to create, manage, and execute digital marketing campaigns more efficiently. This allows marketers to focus on strategy and creativity rather than spending time on manual tasks. Lack of customer insight: ClickDimensions provides advanced analytics and reporting capabilities, giving businesses greater insight into customer behavior and campaign performance. This enables marketers to make data-driven decisions and optimize their marketing strategies for maximum impact.
Ineffective lead nurturing: ClickDimensions includes lead scoring and nurturing tools, helping businesses to identify the most promising leads and engage with them in a personalized and effective way. This can result in higher conversion rates and increased revenue.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I have been using ClickDimensions (front-end) as a marketing professional for close to 20years (at different organisations) and it pretty much does everything I need. Developing complex campaign automations have been a game changer for our business. Lead Nurture and Onboarding campaigns run with a click of a button which means less reliance on the owners of the campaign to implement. Metrics and integration with CRM makes it easy to manage a large database as well as helping to retain our domain reputation. Being able to personalise email content based on a lead or contacts information (such as location) has provided our business with new opportunities and an enviable unsubscribe rate.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The biggest downside for our business is the cost and we are now at a point where the value Click delivers is out-weighed by its financial cost.  With our free weekly email subscription growing from 40,000 to 80,000 in just over 2 years, plus autoresponders, nurture and onboarding campaigns we have climbed to over 2million email sends pa and need a platform that is more suited to a small business (less than 15 FTE and under $3mil turnover).

It would be great if the child record data of an email recipient's Lead/Contact/Account record could be accessed beyond one level - without having to use custom fields and workflows which requires administrator access. Actually anything that enables the user to work more autonomously is welcome.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are a small business with limited resources and using Click we have developed an efficient system for onboarding new clients, responding to transactional enquiries and nurturing prospects. It is also easy to prepare analytics and ROI reports following campaigns as well as maintain a clean CRM database using Click.  Personalised email content has provided new opportunities and an enviable unsubscribe rate.

Advanced find - it is a powerful tool that is relatively easy to use once you have experience with it. The learning curve can be rather steep but after this time it is a fast and helpful way to track customers and find information needed.
I enjoy the way that search criteria is entered (by specifying line by line what one is searching for). It feels tidy and gives confidence in data received

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I find that the UI is a little difficult to understand. It looks nice visually, but there are more menus then I think there need to be, making it difficult to find information needed. This creates a less positive user experience. Making something more simple, and having more of the pertinent information in one place would be better

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
I work in marketing analytics, so I tend to use advanced find a lot. Being able to find customers who fit certain personas is incredibly helpful in my work supporting the wider team

The ease of use overall allows my team to adapt and create email templates quickly and send them as needed without much training.

all_reviews.review_title: ClickDimensions is enhancing the use of CRM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
It enhances CRM use and gives us more possibilities to interact with customers. From targeted newsletters, to surveys. It also forces sales colleagues to clean up data on contacts and accounts, because missing info is showing up.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
It doesn't work well with all browsers. Sometimes it takes a while before functionality is updated.
It is very annoying that ClickDimensions cannot link an incoming survey or form to the contact it was sent out to. Incoming forms are treated by standard CRM rules that look only at the email address as unique identifier. With multiple accounts using the same email address this is not handled well and automation is screwed up, sending reminders to people that have already sent in a survey.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Communication with customers and prospects is much easier now.

all_reviews.review_title: Falls short on the user experience
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions integrates well with Microsoft D365 CRM, which our company uses. It has the ability to save templates for campaign automation which makes the setup easier.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The overall user experience/backend of ClickDimensions isn't very intuitive and has limits to its functionality. For example, when using lists for a campaign automation, they can only be static lists. Its social media functionality is very cumbersome and time-consuming. The reporting functionality is minimal unless you purchase the add-on intelligent dashboards that give you some visibility.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions has allowed us to send out emails to segmented lists and set up campaign automations that run to specific groups by using a segmented marketing list. This has allowed us to stay top-of-mind with our leads and nurture them to become contacts.

all_reviews.review_title: Good small to mid range business solution.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
-Integration with MS Dynamics
-Drag n Drop email editor
-ability to capture form input using pre existing forms
-ability to track web visits using tracking script
-cadence of updates / fixes seems on par with larger solutions

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
- The OOTB form builder seems a bit clunky and limits what can be done with the forms. Form capture may be a better option for enterprises, but it will require developer help.
- There also is no independent document library where we can store docs that need to be attached to emails.  There is a library, but it's hidden within the email editor.
- for email automations we cannot use a dynamically generated list of recipients.
- the Cvent event connector only tracks events up to 90 days out. A good number of events are created and begin registration far in advance so this causes event organizers to check the event site for attendee info until they 90 day threshold when that info is pulled into dynamics.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since we primarily us MS Dynamics, integrating our email analytics info into dynamics has helped create a better view of customer interactions for the business.

all_reviews.review_title: ClickDimensions is the missing marketing piece for Dynamics 365 CRM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I personally like that CD has a superb built-in email editor and the dynamic insertion selections for personalization are outstanding - allowing a very rich and robust personalization to any emails, sequences and automations.  The automation builder is a bit complex but worth the learning curve and handles everything with precision and all the options you need for marketing.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
My only dislike that I have found is that you cannot import a list of existing accounts to add all contacts to a marketing list.  We have account level reporting that sometimes has a need to email all-hands at an account and there is no easy way to cull from an existing list report from other systems...  No workaround that I found so I had to build a desktop macro to pull from a spreadsheet and post into the search field and then add to a pre-made marketing list.  Other then this minor issue, the features are enterprise level and superb.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
The automations allows us to nurture leads better and move from one list to another when they engage on anything and setup activities for our sales teams automatically.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Most of the guesswork has been taken care of. It's quite easy to use... almost too powerful for what I use it for. The support is quite responsive whenever I require help.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
They used to have an online chat support function that either doesn't exist anymore, or I have just had a long string of bad luck reaching anyone, without having to wait until next business day for an email reply. It was so much quicker and efficient but I understand from a resource point of view, having staff wait for online live support can be challenging.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Mass emails to more that 500 recipients at a time (via Outlook). The ability to automate many other processes, such as subscriptions or unsubscribes. The automation saves me hours per week having to manually maintain lists, etc.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
With Click Dimensions, we have the ability to provide real-time marketing insights on our customer's interactions directly to our salespeople via the Dynamics 365 CRM platform. This is a great way to bridge the gap between marketing and sales to ensure there's overall alignment between our efforts and interactions.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The ability to report and build dashboard reports that integrate both the customer data and marketing data is an added cost to the Click Dimensions subscription.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Start small, develop automation and ways to improve your customer communications with a very targeted approach. Utilization and adoption of any system can be difficult, so you have to remember to get small wins at first to help develop your overall longer-term strategy.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Utilizing the marketing automation to more proactively reach out to our customers has allowed us to better align our resources to ensure we're making meaningful touchpoints with our customers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The user interface is clean and easy to understand. Its intergration with our CRM is seamless and provides a lot of data stored in the same place as everything else.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Downtime is rare, but it does happen. Sometimes it's our end and sometimes theirs. In these situations, the amount of support available seems lacking. By the time a response is given, sometimes the issue has already worked itself out. Other times it feels like their support agents are guessing at the problem.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
There are very few options out there for a complete package that also offers complete intergration into CRM. I can't imagine going back to the way it used to be with external mail providers.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Keeping all our data in one place is a huge benefit. It saves us from having to collect data from several sources and cross reference. This allows us to see who's interacting with our emails, which get the most interaction, and what we should think about changing.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The storage space this requires within our CRM is a bit expensive. all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
It's integration with Dynamics 365 makes it easy to create EDMs. Automations are a great use as well.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
It often comes up with a "secruity error" at the worst times, even though nothing about the situation has changed. The formatting in EDMs is awful - e.g. bullet points have a ridiculous space between lines, and text is split across lines, even though it would very easily fit on the one line. Font colour also doesn't match between regular body text and bullet points, even though it has been set to be the same colour.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email automation, no need to manually send emails. Contacts and Leads easily accessible and useable to our advantage. More productive than non-D365 integrated solutions (e.g. MailChimp).

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
- Marketing automation builder is easy to understand and use.
- Native integration with Dynamics 365.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
- Posted form & email click duplications.
- Occasional missing posted form causing missing triggers, resulting in our customers not receiving demo instructions or white papers.
- Oversimplified lead scoring system: I had to build a custom lead scoring system in Power Automate, which also takes the abovementioned duplication issue into account since the score would become unrealistically high otherwise. We will not be using ClickDimensions' new lead scoring system, as it cannot fix the underlying problem we're facing.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
If you absolutely must have native Dynamics 365 integration, this is your only option. Otherwise, I'm hearing from my marketing colleagues that other services offer better ease of use, and I can only imagine getting better stability elsewhere. We'll be looking into changing marketing system in the future.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
- We have had many tickets opened with ClickDimensions, and have been escalated through support tiers multiple times. Our problems: Missing posted forms and posted form duplications. None of this has been resolved even after lengthy support cases. Note that we use WordPress and Gravity Forms - your mileage might vary if you go with the native CDI forms.

- Oversimplified lead scoring system: I had to build a custom lead scoring system in Power Automate, which also takes the abovementioned duplication issue into account since the score would become unrealistically high otherwise. We will not be using ClickDimensions' new lead scoring system, as it cannot fix the underlying problem we're facing.

all_reviews.review_title: I wouldn't recommend ClickDimensions as a marketing solution for B2B companies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I kinda like the integration to Dynamics 365, but that would be the only thing I can mention as a pro in comparison with other products. However, the marketing automation tool for automatic emailing works ok even though it lacks a few important features that it should have by default.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The webforms are one of the biggest pain - they are being loaded very slowly and worsen the overall loading time of the website significantly.
The other major problem is in the emailing section  - if you want to use an analytic feature to track open rate, click rate, etc., all of the clicks from emails will be redirected to the default ClickDimensions domain (something like: analytics.clickdimensions.eu). You can use your own links but only if you don't use SSL certificate on your website which I believe use 99% of companies. The impossibility to use SSL certificates in combination with redirects causes that Google Analytics won't track the click/through email links and you have to stick with ClickDimensions analytics only.
The web analytics section is a complete joke as 90% of IPs are attributed to internet connection providers.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
All of the major problems are described in the section "What do you dislike". To be fair I must mention that there was a problem loading the web forms itselves in some cases and that ClickDimensions team have managed to fix this. However, all of the other problems mentioned are still present.

review_question_answers.answer: I kinda like the integration to Dynamics 365, but that would be the only thing I can mention as a pro in comparison with other products. However, the marketing automation tool for automatic emailing works ok even though it lacks a few important features that it should have by default.

The web analytics section is a complete joke as 90% of IPs are attributed to internet connection providers.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Clickdimensions offer us the possibility to automate tasks that we were not able to do before. Based on the data quality of your CRM you will be able to utilize the tool to it's full capabilities. Recommended for small to mid-sized businesses that have a dedicated marketing department and don't want to have a difficult implementation process. Been using it for over three years and it will fulfill most needs for these kind of companies.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
There is a high learning curve to use this system. You will need a dedicated person that will have to do some training to use this system.  Less intuitive than other MA systems and some technology is running behind. There is a high potential for this tool to develop further if they would invest more time in the development of the user needs.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Decide first what you want to achieve in a 3-5 year phase and match that with the functionalities of this system.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Clickdimensions supports us with consent management, subscription management and running campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: One of the worst I've ever experienced...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I'm going to give Microsoft the benefit of the doubt here and assume it's technically sound and powerful from a database standpoint.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I rarely leave reviews, and certainly not one to look for opportunity to complain, but I felt so strongly about this that I wanted to share with others.  I own a marketing agency and over the years have used many tools - Salesforce, Infusionsoft, Hubspot, etc.  By comparison, Click Dimensions has the absolutely worst user interface by a mile.  In fact, I am really surprised this can even be marketed successfully.  Simple marketing list creation, email creation and editing is 10 times harder and more clunky that it needs to be.  I use this system on behalf or my client about 4-5 times per year on email campaigns... I'm always glad when I finish to get back to using "normal" tools with intuitive work flows, more use of icons, standard nav, etc.  Seriously, this is terrible.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
It helps my client send out emails and automated DRIP campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Poor support. Not suitable for marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Integrates with Microsoft Dynamics for Sales

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Very poor support. At times it's like the customer support has very little knowledge of the platform.
Not very customizable for large companies.
But most annoying is you can't take someone out of automation if they become a customer. This is such an essential requirement of marketing automation. You set up a campaign to sell something to leads. The lead buys your product, and you still have to let the campaign run, selling them the SAME product. I had to stop using it because new customers were complaining they were getting sales emails AFTER they had brought the product. Very annoying. How they did not think this through is madness.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Give it a try. But for us it is not really a great product. Support is not great.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Trying to market our services to e-marketing leads.
But click dimensions is not suitable.
Have been paying for two years...but problems with the system have delayed role out.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I like the ability to send to individuals as well as to larger lists. I also appreciate being able to use templates as well as create free-form emails on the spot.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
I don't like that there are so many areas to complete the process instead of everything happening on one page if you want to send to a marketing list. It would be nice if more of this were step by step in one page rather than having to go to multiple areas.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions helps me send out seemingly personal emails from not my personal or business email. This helps the customers to feel like a real person is connecting with them instead of just some generic automated email send.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
We were considering some other marketing automation tools and we have decided to go with ClickDimensions as it worked most smoothly with our Microsoft Dynamics CRM. We were able to customize some features with the agency which supports our CRM.
Learning curve is quite short if you have experience with Microsoft Dynamics and marketing automation principles. ClickDimensions is now able to fullfill all our needs.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Some setups are clumsy and could be done better and more straightforward. I can imagine more friendly and modern user interface. But this is mainly caused by the fact, that Click Dimensions is built-in solution into the Microsoft Dynamics 365 - which definitely do not provide a top-notch user experience itself.
I can also imagine more advanced Lead Scoring, it would be great if the ClickDimensions team would spend some time on this feature.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
There are some better marketing automation tools on the market. But if you already have to use Microsoft Dynamics, this might be the right option for you how to connect it seamlessly into one solution and do not integrate a few more other systems together.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to manage all our newsletters, marketing automation processes, monitor user activity and easily detect qualified leads and pass them to the sales team.

all_reviews.review_title: A Multitude of Helpful Features, But They Have Their Short Comings
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
I like the number of different features ClickDimensions has to offer. It's one of the few marketing tools that lets you run your entire marketing strategy all in one place. Some of them are fine-tuned and extremely useful.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
This is more internal than a ClickDimensions thing (I think), but I've had a slow time getting set up with ClickDimensions due to a lack of permissions. It has made for a frustrating experience. Also, this may be convenient, but the email editor autosaves every minute or so, and it causes the page to freeze as well as take my cursor out of the box I was working in, causing me to lose my place. It makes email editing a very frustrating experience. Lastly, it tends to be challenging to find certain things throughout ClickDimensions' settings. There are key factors that I've needed to set up in the platform that causes me to go on a wild goose chase to find it. Not very easy to navigate.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
The ease of updating contact/marketing lists is simplified thanks to ClickDimensions. I don't need to worry about consistently checking which contacts are unsubscribed. It makes for a more pleasant experience.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
When you want to work strategically and utilize the potential of your data in Dynamics 365, you must ensure that the marketing automation system you use can also deliver and ensure that you get value for your investment.
This is where ClickDimensions really has its strengths.
ClickDimensions covers 360 degrees around the elements that are important for you to succeed with data-driven marketing.
Get value from your investment in ClickDimensions and exploit the potential of your data.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
More wants more
I want to be able to work even more strategically with my data and use even more data sources.
ClickDimensions must continue to develop flexible methods for using data from all entities.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
ClickDimensions has evolved a lot since they started with their email marketing solution.
We experience users in the Dynamics 365 network who have not kept up with all the new functions and options that ClickDimensions has enriched the solution with. Both about the strategic possibilities around data, new possibilities for executing on data and not least insight and data analysis.

So, if you only ask your own network for advice, ask at the same time until how many of the new features they actually use.?

In addition, remember that most marketing automation systems that have an integration with Dynamics 365 have 80% of the same functions.
In other words, all the systems can probably be used for your needs.

So, you should look at several things that are at least as important when choosing a marketing automation system.
For example, access to support, how exactly does it examine your needs and work processes.
Do you internally have all the resources it requires to exploit potential and get value from your investment - or how can you possibly buy it through a certified partner who speaks your local language?

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions fits perfectly into our strategy of enriching Dynamics 365 with external data and translating it into insights on which we can take sales-ready actions.
Whether it is top funnel or the important step from MQL to SQL, we have both data available but also functions that can support our work processes.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We keep our leads and contacts informed about our products and services, while we also enrich our database to offer even more personalized messages to them and also help our sales to close deals.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
This solution is fully coupled with Dynamics 365 (D365). This provides a seamless integration and allows you to have the data directly within D365 to extend and customize as you need. Their email designer is simple and straight forward to use. The user interface and functionality is all built on Dynamics 365 platform, which provides a consistent D365 experience.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The tool lacks any significant segmentation features, as it leverages the out-of-the-box Dynamics 365 marketing lists, which is extremely limited. Audience segmentation isn't a strong suit for this solution. The native reports they come with are somewhat dated and simple, but you can easily tap into using PowerBI to create your own reports since all the data is part of the dataverse. Their subscription management pages are very basic and limited. Since this leverages Microsoft's dynamics 365 platform, the navigation and user experience are less intuitive than other independent solutions, but it does have the familiar D365 experience overall, so the learning curve is less since most users using this solution are already familiar with how to work with D365, even though it can be difficult for new users.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
This tool is great for those wanting a fully integrated marketing solution with Dynamics 365 that is plug and play. It is an effective tool to do mass outreach, campaign automation, and personalized email experiences. This tool can be extended by a Dynamics 365 development partner to meet unique needs.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: IT Infrastructure ad Service Desk Team Leader

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions has been a very reliable platform that has integrated well with our existing Dynamics 365 CRM system.  We most often use it for basic mailer delivery, form distribution, and event attendance management.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Like any software, usability is dependant on the proper administration of the application.  I inherited this system and found that our account manager had not guided the prior admin to stay up on updates and new features, so we are playing catch up now to learn and implement the use of features that have been in place for several years.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We use ClickDimensions to maintain contact with our donor base, community partners, and volunteers.  Using this system has allowed us to understand better the interactions an individual has with us(especially if they fall into multiple relationship types).

all_reviews.review_title: Quickest way to get started with marketing in Dynamics 365
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
It is the only marketing tool for Dynamics 365 / CRM that is tightly coupled with it. All other marketing applications are stand-alone applications, which have their learning curve. As the product is built on top of CRM and uses CRM's components, it is easy for any CRM User to adapt and start using the Click Dimensions.
We can directly target leads, contact and account records inside CRM without any need to sync it, as in any other stand-alone marketing tool.
All the analytics are available within CRM without any need for sync. It supports lead scoring, integration with Social Media, a built-in email editor, A/B testing tool, i.e., everything one is looking for in a marketing tool for Dynamics 365 / CRM.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The features that can be improved is around support. The support is not that proactive and could take time in resolution of issues.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
All our marketing needs like campaign/engagement management and reporting, surveys, personalized targeting, landing page, social media targeting.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Integrated with Microsoft CRM. Have several products to offer beyond simple email capabilities, and the base package has most of them.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Support, product defects, and general business practices, just like many others have said here. I worked with support extensively on fixing the inaccuracies in the statistics and reports. Their support personnel dragged this on for over a year and I finally gave up. We did get a lot fixed as someone else mentioned but it is still not 100% fixed (I tried). Support needs a lot of training (I had a call with their Manager about this but that didn't seem to result in any changes). They do not let features mature before moving onto the next new thing, so there are a lot of defects. They say that you can propose new features but I tracked their voting system and many features with the highest votes were not implemented. There is a lot of turnover at this company. We did not receive the health check or other services they promised. We renewed in December but almost immediately our connection broke and they could not find the issue. Losing a significant amount of data and it being at the beginning of our term, we decided to cut ties. However, even with 0% usage on the renewal contract, they refused to refund any of our money.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Don't choose this product based on the integration with Dynamics 365. That convenience will not offset the problems you will have (see other negative reviews, they speak truth).

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We used the mass email marketing, event participations/surveys, forms and landing pages, and campaign automations. It is very convenient to have this integrated with Dynamics 365 and we wrote many workflows. So the benefits we had were automation, sharing of information with D365, and centralizing many marketing tasks. Unfortunately that was more than offset by the issues of getting the products to work correctly and accurately.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Because the platform is so basic, it's easy to use.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Formatting NEVER stays consistent within an email. You have to re-select your fonts and colors several times in order for the formatting to actually stay. However, when you send an email, sometimes the formatting gets all messed up and it ends up looking like you picked different sizes for text in the same paragraph. The functionality of the platform in regards to email sends is so limited that it makes it nearly impssible to send a nice looking, spam-free, email.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Look at other platforms.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
ClickDimensions is the only platform we're using for email sends so every single communication we send to prospects or clients is going through this platform. Recently we've figured out how to have it communicate better with our servers and website, however it still doesn't give us all the information we need.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Dynamics CRM integration (like everyone else)

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
We require days or even weeks to get simple issues resolved. The turnaround time is hours or days between a support agent asking us for information (which we provide immediately) and them getting back to us with anything other than speculation that the issue is not on our side (we must've broken something). On two issues, we discovered that our problems were due to a fault on their side (to which we have zero exposure), and both times, it was like pulling teeth to get any acknowledgement. Almost all of our other support experiences have been equally unsatisfying ... some were even closed without resolution/explanation. Once or twice, we had a good support experience out of about 20 I can recall. Very little accountability. My CSM even criticized my use of 'CDI' in reference to ClickDimensions ... said that was 'confusing' even though that's what many customers and CDI employees refer to it in text. Also, Email Statistics were BROKEN for years and still have issues. Issues are less frequent now, but getting them resolved is a real chore, because each and every time, we need to basically argue with their techs that the issue is not our 'fault' but rather on the CDI side in most cases. Our data is in a "black box" on the CDI side, and they often fail to deliver or provide explanation, even upon explicit request.

Full disclosure: We did once have an 'issue' that was purely our own fault, and we did press them a bit as if it were a CDI problem. I apologized profusely.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
It needs time to more fully mature; although, it is much better today than it was a year ago. They need to drastically improve their customer service results and accountability. They are all 'nice', but that means little when they lack accountability or get defensive or insinuate that they don't have much respect for their customers as evidenced by their tech-support follow-through, explanation, and accountability.

Also, this product is married to Microsoft Dynamics CRM and will live or die by that platform, which has many of its own issues.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
tying information from marketing campaigns to leads and customers (when it works). Campaign automation (when it works). email marketing (when it works)

Full disclosure: The application and service has been working much better since late 2017; however, a service failure caused by a CDI "feature issue" (vague, right??) that took 4 days for them to acknowledge is why I am taking the time to write this review.

all_reviews.review_title: Click Dimensions is an adequate email tool with CRM integration.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
Integrating with our CRM, Microsoft Dynamics 365, is very appreciated. The email builder works well and metrics come out in a usable format.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Marketing lists, in that I cannot upload them as an excel directly or it would make duplicate contact records in our CRM. Instead, I have to add people manually, on by one, or send over to IT to run various back-end workflows to upload them (uploading and merging with existing contacts. Some metrics like viewing open rates and click-through-rates by organization/account level, are unavailable (which I have contacted Click Dimensions about).

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Compare to other email campaign tools. If you don't need CRM integration, then Constant Contact is likely a better option in terms of overall value. IF you're looking for a CRM and email tool all in one, HubSpot would likely be a better choice.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
A tool to create, send, and analyze email campaigns making use of contact records in our CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: Great for Integration with Microsoft CRM
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
It integrated very well with Microsoft CRM, and allows us to fully automate our marketing campaigns, taking out much of the manual work we used to do with form submissions and creating leads and updating contacts. It also means we can use our CRM marketing lists rather than having to export data and have data links pushing information back into CRM that never used to work very well. This integration allows us to report more accurately on our marketing campaigns.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Some of the tools for designing landing pages and form can be a bit fiddly in order to get them looking nice. We also found some issues with embedding forms, and getting them to redirect how we wanted etc so had to use a work around. There is also no global section to cover all landing pages on the domain do any tracking codes etc has to be added on each page which is time consuming and annoying when things change as have to change each one.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Great if you want a fully integrated marketing automation tool that links with Microsoft CRM.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
The integration with Microsoft CRM has saved so much time and given us the ability to report more effectively on our marketing campaigns. It allows us to quickly and easily communicate with our prospects and customers without having to export any data.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
There's not much I can say about this product which is positive. Constant breakdowns, fatal errors, slow speeds, you name it.

Originally I liked the campaign automations feature as the builder made it easy for it to do automations, but then it just kind of stopped working.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Wow where do I start. Never have I used a CRM that constantly gave me fatal error screens and system log dumps. At least they stayed true to the Microsoft way of life I suppose. Of the parts I used:

Processes - was warned by tech team to not use them as it would "cause the entire software to crash", mainly due to poor resource management. Slow, wouldn't start straight away so can't be relied on for fast automation.

Campaign Automations - so many errors. Cloning an automation gave me a fatal error 100% of the time, I presumed mainly because background processes couldn't keep up with creating all the parts. I asked support and they couldn't solve this issue. Publishing campaign automations would just cause them to be stuck sometimes, and half the time I can't even get the builder to load. Granted a lot of the issues I had was an internal IT issue with their processes and permissions, but just using it gave me rage issues. Every now and then I would get a fatal error which can be solved by signing in and out again, so it appears to be a session issue, but for it to do it whilst I'm working on something is somewhat of an issue.

Loading speeds - I have colleagues from different parts of the world with a common problem: Clickdimensions isn't loading.

Accessibility in china - Pretty much 0% of it working there. Load times were atrocious. I had to create form captures and code out all forms manually in HTML, which took away days of my life. Support also warned us that email deliverability in China would be bad and pretty much all marketing features won't work properly there.


Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Don't. Seriously, just try it and then try another one and you will see that clickdimensions is seriously lacking in quality.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We were trying to automate our marketing processes, and none. There were no benefits.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
review_question_answers.answer:
There's not much I can say about this product which is positive. Constant breakdowns, fatal errors, slow speeds, you name it.

Originally I liked the campaign automations feature as the builder made it easy for it to do automations, but then it just kind of stopped working.

review_question_answers.answer:
Wow where do I start. Never have I used a CRM that constantly gave me fatal error screens and system log dumps. At least they stayed true to the Microsoft way of life I suppose. Of the parts I used:

Processes - was warned by tech team to not use them as it would "cause the entire software to crash", mainly due to poor resource management. Slow, wouldn't start straight away so can't be relied on for fast automation.

Campaign Automations - so many errors. Cloning an automation gave me a fatal error 100% of the time, I presumed mainly because background processes couldn't keep up with creating all the parts. I asked support and they couldn't solve this issue. Publishing campaign automations would just cause them to be stuck sometimes, and half the time I can't even get the builder to load. Granted a lot of the issues I had was an internal IT issue with their processes and permissions, but just using it gave me rage issues. Every now and then I would get a fatal error which can be solved by signing in and out again, so it appears to be a session issue, but for it to do it whilst I'm working on something is somewhat of an issue.

Loading speeds - I have colleagues from different parts of the world with a common problem: Clickdimensions isn't loading.

Accessibility in china - Pretty much 0% of it working there. Load times were atrocious. I had to create form captures and code out all forms manually in HTML, which took away days of my life. Support also warned us that email deliverability in China would be bad and pretty much all marketing features won't work properly there.

review_question_answers.question: Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
review_question_answers.answer: Don't. Seriously, just try it and then try another one and you will see that clickdimensions is seriously lacking in quality.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We were trying to automate our marketing processes, and none. There were no benefits.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to get going - but several limitations
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions being a solution in Dynamics 365 means direct access to data and very easy to use for marketing departments being used to the product.
It's very easy to get going with ClickDimensions. Emails, advanced campaign automation, webtracking etc are just a few clicks away once the product is installed.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Many features are lacking depth and flexability, which means that especially personalized content is difficult to create.
While ClickDimensions is installed into Dynamics 365, it doesn't feel like data is being utilized very well. There's no segmentation beyond the existing margeting lists. Most of the time only data existing in fields directly on the contact, account or lead entities can be used.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
You can get really far, very quickly and for a low price with ClickDimensions.
Be aware of limitations in segmentation and personalization.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Advanced campaign automation flows for new customers.
Contests.
Improved data quality on customers through custom forms.

all_reviews.review_title: Potentially a great tool but experience to date has been poor
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
It's full Integration with Dynamics CRM and it's functionality (Email, Forms, website tracking, SMS and more) make it an appealing option for a company wanting a holistic view of their customers' interactions.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
lack of product stability, product bugs and how it can take a long time to get a solution from support. Poor account management, no response when escalating an issue and material price increases.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
Be careful, it's full and seamless integration with CRM is alluring but also ties you in. The product appears to be capable and I have heard positive use cases but my experience has been average at best.  The product has felt flakey, persistent error messages have prevented access to functionality, significant numbers of emails have failed to be sent, the automated campaign feature had limitations so we could not use it, a product bug with the send date in an automated campaign prevented an important campaign going out at the right time. Support, whilst readily available, takes a long time to come with an answer if at all and when escalating to account manager we received no response. Price changes of around 20% within our first year on the back of the negative experience positions this software as one of the worst software experiences I have had in 20 years.

On a positive note, we are continuing to use it due to its integration with CRM and I want it to work! However, if there was an alternative with a similar level of CRM integration I certainly would have moved by now.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email marketing and communication with succinct integration back to client records.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
ClickDimensions natively integrates to Microsoft Dynamics 365/CRM so we can work within one application.  We can also get analytics and business intelligence from email campaigns directly in Dynamics. Our online forms are integrated to ClickDimensions so our lead and marketing automation is automated. ClickDimensions is also fairly easy to use, even for a non-technical person.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
The biggest things we dislike about ClickDimensions are the customer support, lack of customized templates, the customer survey features is poor, and the limited or lack of integration with custom entities.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
If you are looking for an easy marketing automation tool for Dynamics, then ClickDimensions is a great fit.  If you are looking for something more advanced with a lot of features and functionality, then ClickDimensions is probably not a good fit.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a native tool for marketing automation within our Microsoft Dynamics 365/CRM system.  We can track leads and customers within one application.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about ClickDimensions?
The native integration with Dynamics CRM is what sold me. It's definitely convenient having everything in one place.

What do you dislike about ClickDimensions?
Support:
-Not very responsive, and in some cases not very knowledgeable. There have been a few cases where I had to explain something several times because their response was not helpful.

Features:
-Definitely lacking on some of the features, compared to other solutions. In some cases it's shocking what it doesn't do or doesn't do well.

Recommendations to others considering ClickDimensions:
It's definitely convenient having a marketing automation tool that works natively in Dynamics CRM, and that was a huge selling point for me. However, its features are definitely lacking compared to other solutions, and in some cases shockingly so. They have a lot of improvements to make, including their survey tool, campaign automation, and A/B testing. I also seem to have a lot of technical issues I have to work through with them on a monthly basis.

What problems is ClickDimensions solving and how is that benefiting you?
The native integration with Dynamics CRM is extremely valuable. With our previous tool, we needed a third-party tool to sync leads from the marketing automation to CRM, which cost us extra money. Having everything all in one place is very convenient.
